analysis.description:
DDDico.fetchRate (/unique_chucks/3/0xe129417140b1b4f5f3d5dcb554ddeb8d89c04a92.sol#345-370) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- DDDico.applicableRate

ERC20Token (/unique_chucks/3/0xe129417140b1b4f5f3d5dcb554ddeb8d89c04a92.sol#76-272) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/3/0xe129417140b1b4f5f3d5dcb554ddeb8d89c04a92.sol#131-143)

DDDico.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0xe129417140b1b4f5f3d5dcb554ddeb8d89c04a92.sol#317-331) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferICO(msg.sender,tok) (/unique_chucks/3/0xe129417140b1b4f5f3d5dcb554ddeb8d89c04a92.sol#329-330)

DDDico.block0 should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0xe129417140b1b4f5f3d5dcb554ddeb8d89c04a92.sol#287)
